mysql> select * from test;
+----+--------------------+------+
| id | name               | age  |
+----+--------------------+------+
|  1 | Yiannis            |   19 |
|  2 | Natali             |   20 |
|  3 | Friedrich Neitzche |   33 |
+----+--------------------+------+
3 rows in set (0.00 sec)

mysql> notee
